DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety tolerability elotuzumab administer combination thalidomide dexamethasone treatment relapse and/or refractory multiple myeloma .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Elotuzumab Combination With Thalidomide Dexamethasone Relapsed and/or Refractory Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com . Key Confirmed diagnosis previously treat multiple myeloma progression document criterion International Myeloma Working Group recent therapy Patient receive 5 few prior line therapy Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status 0 1 ( safety leadin cohort ) 0 2 ( additional patient ) Measurable disease define least 1 follow : Serum immunoglobulin ( Ig ) G , IgA , IgM , monoclonal ( M ) protein level ≥0.5 g/dL serum IgD M protein level ≥0.05 g/dL ; Urine M protein level ≥200 mg excrete 24hour collection sample ; Involved serum free light chain level ≥10 mg/dL , provide free light chain ratio abnormal Key Solitary bone solitary extramedullary plasmacytoma evidence plasma cell dyscrasia Monoclonal gammopathy undetermined significance , smolder myeloma , Waldenström 's macroglobulinemia Left ventricular ejection fraction echocardiogram Multi Gated Acquisition ≤50 % Electrocardiogram finding QTc ≥450 msec Active plasma cell leukemia ( define either 20 % peripheral white blood cell , compose plasma/CD138+ cell absolute plasma cell count 2*10^9/L ) Diagnosis nonsecretory myeloma Active hepatitis A , B , C virus infection Grade ≥2 neuropathy
